languages.text: В ноздри бьет едкий запах реагентов, под ногами хрустит стекло — некто хотел уничтожить лабораторию. Или что-то найти.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] В лаборатории беспорядок, реагенты разлиты по полу, в ноздри бьется едкий запах. Тут кто-то что-то искал

languages.text: The caustic stench of reagents sears your nostrils and broken glass crunches underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something.
languages.original_text: В ноздри бьет едкий запах реагентов, под ногами хрустит стекло — некто хотел уничтожить лабораторию. Или что-то найти.

traits.locale_text: The caustic stench of the reagents is tearing at your nostrils, the broken glass crunching underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something important.
The caustic stench of the reagents is tearing at your nostrils, the broken glass crunching underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something important.
The caustic stench of the reagents is tearing at your nostrils, the broken glass crunching underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something.
The caustic stench of the reagents is tearing at your nostrils, the broken glass crunching underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something.
The caustic stench of reagents sears your nostrils and broken glass crunches underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something.
The caustic stench of reagents sears your nostrils and broken glass crunches underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something.

languages.text: El hedor corrosivo de los reactivos quema tus fosas nasales y cristales rotos crujen bajo tus pies; alguien pretendía destruir el laboratorio. O buscaba algo.
languages.original_text: The caustic stench of reagents sears your nostrils and broken glass crunches underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something.

traits.locale_text: El hedor corrosivo de los reactivos quema tus fosas nasales y cristales rotos crujen bajo tus pies; alguien pretendía destruir el laboratorio. O buscaba algo.

languages.text: Der beißende Gestank von Reagenzien verbrennt deine Nasenlöcher, unter deinen Füßen knackt zerbrochenes Glas — jemand wollte das Laboratorium zerstören. Oder etwas finden.
languages.original_text: The caustic stench of reagents sears your nostrils and broken glass crunches underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something.

traits.locale_text: Der beißende Gestank von Reagenzien verbrennt deine Nasenlöcher, unter deinen Füßen knackt zerbrochenes Glas — jemand wollte das Laboratorium zerstören. Oder etwas finden.

languages.text: La puanteur caustique des réactifs vous saisit les narines, tandis que du verre brisé craque sous vos pieds ; quelqu'un tenait vraiment à détruire ce laboratoire... ou à trouver quelque chose.
languages.original_text: The caustic stench of reagents sears your nostrils and broken glass crunches underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something.

traits.locale_text: La puanteur caustique des réactifs vous saisit les narines, tandis que du verre brisé craque sous vos pieds ; quelqu'un tenait vraiment à détruire ce laboratoire... ou à trouver quelque chose.

languages.text: 试剂散发的尖锐恶臭扑鼻而来，脚下的碎玻璃发出嘎吱嘎吱的响声。之前有什么人打算毁掉这间实验室，或是想在这里找到些什么。
languages.original_text: The caustic stench of reagents sears your nostrils and broken glass crunches underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something.

traits.locale_text: 试剂散发的尖锐恶臭扑鼻而来，脚下的碎玻璃发出嘎吱嘎吱的响声。之前有什么人打算毁掉这间实验室，或是想在这里找到些什么。

languages.text: 試薬の不快な臭いが鼻孔を突き抜け、割れたガラスが足元でパキパキと音を立てた…実験室を壊そうと企む何者かがいたのだ。もしくは、何かを探していたのだろう。
languages.original_text: The caustic stench of reagents sears your nostrils and broken glass crunches underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something.

traits.locale_text: 試薬のキツイ臭いが鼻孔を突き抜け、割れたガラスが足元でパキパキと音を立てた…実験室を壊そうと企む何者かがいたのだ。もしくは、何かを探していたのだろう。
試薬の不快な臭いが鼻孔を突き抜け、割れたガラスが足元でパキパキと音を立てた…実験室を壊そうと企む何者かがいたのだ。もしくは、何かを探していたのだろう。

languages.text: Ayıraçlardan yayılan yakıcı koku, burun deliklerine hücum ediyor. Bu sırada yerdeki cam kırıkları, ayaklarının altında çatırdıyor. Birileri laboratuvarı imha etme veya bir şey bulma peşindeymiş.
languages.original_text: The caustic stench of reagents sears your nostrils and broken glass crunches underfoot — somebody wanted to destroy the laboratory. Or find something.

traits.locale_text: Ayıraçlardan yayılan yakıcı koku, burun deliklerine hücum ediyor. Bu sırada yerdeki cam kırıkları, ayaklarının altında çatırdıyor. Birileri laboratuvarı imha etme veya bir şey bulma peşindeymiş.
